page.title: 04EDUCATION IN DIPTON.
page.content: {MONDAY AT SCHOOL by LISA LISHMAN. School begins at 8.55a.m.We form class lines in the yard and we walk into the porch to leave our coats.In class we say Morning Prayers and Mrs.Pinkerton, the Clerk,takes the Dinner Money. {Morning lessons start with Jesus {Work, and afterwards we do Mental {Arithmetic,Spelling,and Number Work. {Playtime is between 10.40.and 10.55am. {At midday, I have a school meal in the {Dining Hall.I especially enjoy it when {it is sausages, followed by apple pie. {Afternoon lessons begin at 1.00pm.with {P.E.in the Hall.At 1.35pm.we do Topic {Work,History,or Geography. Afternoon playtime is between 2.15. and 2.30pm.After Break,I finish off my work and then read my book. {At 3.00pm.Mrs.O'Sullivan,our Class {Teacher, reads us a story until the {bell rings for hometime at 3.30.p.m.
